text: Mirosław Kowalewski (born 12 April 1952) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Szczecin
title: Mirosław Kowalewski
